title: Does rest really help you recover from a cold?
text:
The long-running series in which readers answer other readers’ questions on subjects ranging from trivial flights of fancy to profound scientific and philosophical concepts

Does rest really help you recover from a cold?

Does resting really help you recover from a cold? People always tell me to take it easy when I’m ailing. But has anyone ever scientifically tested whether or not this really helps?

Tom Vivian, Seattle, US
